title: Crypto Regulation, Supply Chain Constraints, Labor
itunes:title: Crypto Regulation, Supply Chain Constraints, Labor
description:
Mary Beth Buchanan, President of Americas and Global Chief Legal Officer at Merkle Science, discusses cryptocurrency regulation. David Kudla, CEO and Chief Investment Strategist at Mainstay Capital Management, discusses his current investment outlook and the health of the economy. Ataman Ozyildirim, Director of Economic Research and Global Research Chair at the Conference Board, discusses monthly LEI data. Barry Ritholtz, Founder of Ritholtz Wealth Management, Bloomberg Opinion columnist, and Host of Masters in Business, discusses the labor market. Hosted by Matt Miller and Paul Sweeney.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
